Quiz App This app will test your basic knowledge of Java programming Language. Start Question 1 Question 2 Question 3 Question 4 Question 5 Question 6
Which of the following statements is true? Java is used only in NASA\'s space related applications Java has a huge developer community Java is used only in web and mobile applications Which variable type would you use for a city name? double String int What is the reult of the following code? int x=15; int y =4; int result = x/y; System.out.println(result); 3 4 5 Which statement in regard to the char data type is true? "hello" is char \'k\' is a char char is used to store numeric values In Java,an array starts counting from.. 0 -1 3 6 How many times can you call a method? How many times can you call a method? one as many as you want only two Result Click the button below to review your quiz. Review
